revised_title: Mechanical Properties of Natural Materials: Material Property Charts and Performance Indices
tldr: This article explores the mechanical properties of various natural materials such as wood, muscle, shell, and bone. It uses material property charts and performance indices to compare these natural materials with engineering materials. The study reveals that many natural materials have exceptional mechanical properties and perform better in specific applications. The article also discusses the origins of this superiority and how the structure of these materials influences their properties.
